com.tomtom.speedtools.tilemap

Class MapConst

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomtom.speedtools.tilemap.MapConst

  • public final class MapConst
extends Object
    This class represents an (abstract) cacheable map. The type parameter T is the image tile type. It is parametrized to allow retrieving tiles in different internal formats, such as AWT Image objects, or Processing PImage objects.
